2007208.effect: If you control a "Tindangle" monster: You can discard 1 other card; Special Summon this card from your hand or GY, then if it was Special Summoned from the hand, you can Special Summon 1 "Tindangle" monster from your Deck in face-up or face-down Defense Position. If this card is in your GY, except the turn it was sent there: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Set monster you control; flip it face-up. You can only use each effect of "Tindangle Scythe Slasher" once per turn.
2007208.name: Tindangle Scythe Slasher

2007252.effect: When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap card or effect, while you control a "Tindangle" Link Monster or a Defense Position "Tindangle" monster (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon this card from your hand or GY, then if it was Special Summoned from the hand, negate the activation. If this card is used for the Link Summon of a "Tindangle" monster: You can discard 1 card; Special Summon 1 other "Tindangle" monster from your GY. You can only use each effect of "Tindangle Astro Gardna" once per turn.
2007252.name: Tindangle Astro Gardna

2007226.effect: (This card is always treated as a "Tindangle" card.) If this card is activated: You can add 1 "Tindangle" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Point of Perfection". You can target 1 Set monster you control; flip it face-up. During the Main Phase: You can Special Summon 1 "Tindangle" monster from your hand in face-up or face-down Defense Position, but send this card to the GY during the End Phase. You can only use one effect of "Point of Perfection" per turn, and only once per turn.
2007226.name: Point of Perfection

1601930.effect: (This is always treated as a "Tindangle" card.) When your opponent activates a monster effect: You can change the battle position of a face-down "Tindangle" monster you control, OR Set 1 face-up "Tindangle" monster you control, and if you do, negate the activation, then if your opponent controls more cards than you do, destroy it. If you Flip Summon a "Tindangle" monster, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can Set this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use this effect of "Alcazar Shield" once per turn.
1601930.name: Alcazar Shield

1298190.effect:
1 "Tindangle" monster, except "Tindangle Acute Unicorn"
When this card is Link Summoned: You can add 1 "Tindangle Base Gardna" from your Deck to your hand. When a "Tindangle" monster you control is flipped face-up, while this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Tindangle Acute Unicorn" once per turn.
1298190.name: Tindangle Acute Unicorn

1298170.effect:
2 "Tindangle" monsters
You can discard 1 card; add 1 "Alcazar Shield" from your Deck to your hand. This card can be treated as 2 monsters for the Link Summon of a "Tindangle" monster. During your opponent's turn, if this card points to a face-down Defense Position monster (Quick Effect): You can change 1 monster this card points to to face-up Attack Position or face-up Defense Position. You can only use each effect of "Tindangle Acute Griffin" once per turn.
1298170.name: Tindangle Acute Griffin

2007274.effect:
3 "Tindangle", Fiend and/or Flip monsters
If this card is Link Summoned: You can pay 500 LP; Special Summon 1 Flip monster from your GY in face-up or face-down Defense Position to a zone this card points to. If a monster this card points to is flipped face-up: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it, then Special Summon 1 "Tindangle Token" (Fiend/DARK/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0). If another "Tindangle" monster battles an opponents monster, you can have your monster gain 500 ATK for every monster you control, until the End Phase. You can only use each effect of "Tindangle Obtuse Orthus" once per turn.
2007274.name: Tindangle Obtuse Orthus

2012904.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your Deck) by Tributing 5 Warrior monsters you control with different Attributes. Up to thrice per turn, if your opponent controls 2 or more monsters with different names (Quick Effect): You can destroy 1 random monster your opponent controls. During the End Phase, if you destroyed 3 monsters by this effect: You can roll a six-sided die, then, if you rolled a 1 or 6, Set 1 Normal Trap from your Deck, also it can be activated this turn. You can only use this effect of "Hittameys, the Blind General" once per turn.
2012904.name: Hittameys, the Blind General

2010227.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can add 1 "Metalmorph" card from your Deck to your hand, then you can add 1 Level 3 or 7 DARK Normal Monster from your Deck or GY to your hand, or, if this is the only monster you control, you can Special Summon it, instead, and if you do, it cannot be destroyed or banished by card effects, but you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn.
2010227.name: Incher

2010232.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your Deck) by Tributing "Incher" equipped with "Metalmorph". If this card is Special Summoned: You can Set 1 "Metalmorph" card from your GY.
2010232.name: Metalincher

2010204.effect: If a card is targeted by the effect of a "Leaf Man" card: You can Special Summon this card from your hand or GY.
2010204.name: The Leaf Man

2010199.effect: Target 1 card on the field; resolve this effect.
2010199.name: Inspired by the Leaf Man

2003529.effect: During your Main Phase 2: Draw 1 card for each card your opponent has drawn by their card effects during their Main Phase(s) during their previous turn. You can only activate 1 "Pot of Pleonexia" per turn.
2003529.name: Pot of Pleonexia

2010238.effect:
Target 1 face-up monster on the field; equip this card to that target. This card's name becomes "Metalmorph" while face-up on the field. During the Main Phase: You can activate the appropriate effect(s), depending on the equipped monster.
● Normal Monster: Target 1 card on the field; destroy it.
● Effect Monster: Set 1 "Metalmorph" Trap from your Deck, except "Fullmetalmorph", then you can equip this card to 1 Normal Monster on the field.
You can only use this effect of "Fullmetalmorph" once per turn per equipped monster's original name.
2010238.name: Fullmetalmorph

2014919.effect: Each time a Fusion Monster is Fusion Summoned by banishing a Fusion Material(s) in your possession: You can target 1 card on the field; send it to the GY, then banish that card in the GY during the End Phase. You can only control 1 "Tyrmadical Hierarchy".
2014919.name: Tyrmadical Hierarchy

2014904.effect:
2 Effect Monsters with different Attributes
During the Main Phase: You can banish 1 "Polymerization" from your Deck; Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by banishing Fusion Materials listed on it, including this card on the field and 1 monster from your hand. If this card leaves the field by an opponent's card effect: You can Set 1 banished "Polymerization" to your field. You can only use 1 "Alyster Thylyma" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
2014904.name: Alyster Thylyma

2014870.effect:
2+ Effect Monsters
You cannot Summon/Set monsters to any Extra Monster Zone this card points to. Can only declare attacks on linked monsters. If a monster is destroyed by battle: You can make each player gain 2000 LP, then apply 1 of these effects (but you cannot apply that same effect of "Hyper Ryder" again this turn).
● Special Summon the destroyed monster to any zone this card points to.
● Move 1 monster your opponent controls to another Main Monster Zone on either field.
● Banish this card until the End Phase.
2014870.name: Hyper Ryder

2015230.effect:
Cannot be Special Summoned. During the End Phase of the turn this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up: Return it to the hand. To Tribute Summon this card face-up, you can Tribute a Field Spell, Continuous Spell, or Pendulum Spell Card you control, instead of a monster. (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 Pendulum monster you control, then target 1 card you control; While that face-up card is on the field the first time a card or effect activated from the hand would resolve, your opponent must activate 1 of the following effects.
● Discard 1 card.
● Your opponent draw 2 cards.
If this card is in your face-up Extra Deck: You can shuffle 1 card from your hand into the Deck; add this card to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Princess Kaguya" once per turn.
2015230.name: Princess Kaguya
2015230.pendulum_effect: If you Pendulum Summon while this card is in your Pendulum Zone and you have "Tamamo-no-Mae" in your other Pendulum Zone: Draw 1 card.

2015207.effect:
Cannot be Special Summoned. During the End Phase of the turn this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up: Return it to the hand. To Tribute Summon this card face-up, you can Tribute a Field Spell, Continuous Spell, or Pendulum Spell Card you control, instead of a monster. (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 Pendulum monster you control, then target 1 card your opponent controls; Your opponent must activate 1 of the following effects. 
● Return that card to their hand, then shuffle 1 card from their hand to the Deck.
● Set that card facedown (if it is face-up) and it cannot be flipped up nor be be destroyed by card effects.
If this card is in your face-up Extra Deck: You can shuffle 1 card from your hand into the Deck; add this card to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Tamamo-no-Mae" once per turn.
2015207.name: Tamamo-no-Mae
2015207.pendulum_effect: If you Pendulum Summon while this card is in your Pendulum Zone: Return 1 card from your hand to your Deck.

2015237.effect:
Banish 1 card from your hand; Reveal your hand to your opponent, then if you do, they must activate 1 of the following effects, but if the banished card was a Spirit monster, you can choose the activated effect. 
● Discard 1 card, then your opponent draws 1 card.
● Skip your next 2 Draw Phases. 
You can activate 1 "Peering Souls" once per turn.
2015237.name: Peering Souls

2015603.effect:
2 Effect monsters, including a DARK or LIGHT Pendulum monster
(This card is always also treated as a Dark monster). If you control a Pendulum Spirit monster in your Pendulum Zone: Place 1 Pendulum Spirit monster directly from your Deck in your other Pendulum Zone. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: Your opponent must discard 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Rosmontis, the Divination" once per turn.
2015603.name: Rosmontis, the Divination

2015623.effect:
2 Effect monsters, including a DARK or LIGHT Pendulum monster
(This card is also always treated as a LIGHT monster). You can Special Summon 1 Pendulum Spirit monster from your hand, ignoring its Summoning Conditions. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: Draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Sinarious, the Assumption" once per turn.
2015623.name: Sinarious, the Assumption

2014237.effect:
Cannot be used as Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Material. This card gains 500 ATK/DEF for each Trap in on the field and in the GYs. This card can attack all monsters your opponent controls, once each. You can only use each of the following effects of "Magical Mad Hatter" once per turn.
● If a Trap Card(s) is activated: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, or if you activated the Trap Card, you can Special Summon this card from your GY instead.
● (Quick Effect): You can discard 1 card; add 1 "Magical Hats", or 1 card that specifically lists that card in its text, except "Magical Mad Hatter", from your Deck to your hand, then, you can Set 1 Trap from your hand, also if you Set "Magical Hats", it can be activated this turn.
2014237.name: Magical Mad Hatter

2014231.effect:
All monsters on the field must attack, if able. You can only use each of the following effects of "The Strange Hattery" once per turn.
● You can activate "Magical Hats" during your Battle Phase, but if you do, the effect becomes "choose 2 Spells/Traps from your Deck and 1 monster in your opponent's Main Monster Zone. Special Summon them as Normal Monsters (ATK 0/DEF 0) in face-down Defense Position to your opponent's field, Set the chosen monster if it is face-up, and shuffle them on the field. The 2 cards chosen from your Deck are destroyed at the end of the Battle Phase, and cannot remain on the field except during this Battle Phase.".
● During the End Phase, if you have not Normal Summoned/Set this turn: You can shuffle 3 cards with different names from your GY into your Deck, then target 1 "Magical Hats", or 1 card that specifically lists that card in its text, in your GY; Set it to your field.
2014231.name: The Strange Hattery

2011315.effect: Special Summon this card in Defense Position as a Normal Monster (Spellcaster/DARK/Level 2/ATK 1000/DEF 0). (This card is NOT treated as a Trap.) If this card is destroyed by battle: You can draw 2 cards, then shuffle 1 card from your hand into the Deck, also if "Magical Hats" is in your GY, you can add 1 "Magical Hats" or 1 card that specifically that card in its text, from your GY to your hand, except "Blue Hat". You can only use this effect of "Blue Hat" once per turn.
2011315.name: Blue Hat

2014257.effect:
Pay 800 LP; apply 1 of these effects. You cannot apply that same effect of "Madness of Mercury" again this turn.
● Set 1 "Magical Hats", or 1 Trap that specifically lists that card in its text, from your hand, also it can be activated this turn.
● Add 1 "Magical Hats", or 1 Trap that specifically lists that card in its text, except "Madness of Mercury", from your Deck to your hand. 
● Target 1 card on the field; shuffle 3 cards with different names from your GY into your Deck, that are "Magical Hats", or cards that specifically lists that card in its text, and if you do, banish the target.
You can activate this card from your hand, but if you do, you cannot Summon or Set monsters from your hand, GY, or Extra Deck for the rest of this Duel, except "Magical Mad Hatter".
2014257.name: Madness of Mercury

2011317.effect: Special Summon this card in Defense Position as a Normal Monster (Spellcaster/DARK/Level 6/ATK 2500/DEF 0). (This card is NOT treated as a Trap.) If this card is destroyed by battle: You can add 1 "Magical Hats" or 1 card that specifically that card in its text, from your Deck to your hand, except "Mysterious Hat", also if "Magical Hats" is in your GY, you can banish 1 card from either GY. You can only use this effect of "Mysterious Hat" once per turn.
2011317.name: Mysterious Hat

2011313.effect: Special Summon this card in Defense Position as a Normal Monster (Spellcaster/DARK/Level 3/ATK 0/DEF 1500). (This card is NOT treated as a Trap.) If this card is destroyed by battle: You can destroy 1 card on the field, also if "Magical Hats" is in your GY, draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Red Hat" once per turn.
2011313.name: Red Hat

2011319.effect: Special Summon this card in Defense Position as a Normal Monster (Spellcaster/DARK/Level 7/ATK 0/DEF 3000). (This card is NOT treated as a Trap.) If this card is destroyed by battle: You can banish up to 3 cards from the GYs, also if "Magical Hats" is in your GY, you can negate the effects of 1 face-up card on the field. You can only use this effect of "Shimmering Hat" once per turn.
2011319.name: Shimmering Hat

2018789.effect: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Trapod Automated Token" (Machine/DARK/Level 4/ATK 1800/DEF 1000). You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate this effect, except "Trapod" monsters. You can only use this effect of "Automating Trapod" once per turn.
2018789.name: Automated Trapod

2018795.effect: Send 1 Spell/Trap you control to the GY, except "Trapod Anchord"; Special Summon this card as a Normal Monster (Machine/DARK/ Level 4/ ATK 1000/ DEF 1000). (This card is NOT treated as a Trap). If this card is sent to the GY: You can banish 1 Trap from your GY, except "Trapod Anchord", then target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target. You can only use each effect of "Trapod Anchord" once per turn.
2018795.name: Trapod Anchord

2018804.effect: Send 1 Spell/Trap you control to the GY, except "Trapod Heat Seeker"; Special Summon this card as a Normal Monster (Machine/DARK/ Level 4/ ATK 1000/ DEF 1000). (This card is NOT treated as a Trap). If this card is sent to the GY: You can banish 1 Trap from your GY. except "Trapod Heat Seeker", then target 1 face up monster your opponent controls; destroy that target. You can only use each effect of "Trapod Heat Seeker" once per turn.
2018804.name: Trapod Heatseeker

2018762.effect:
1 non-Link "Trapod" monster
You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you Special Summon this card, except "Trapod" monsters. "Trapod" monsters in the same column as a monster your opponent controls can attack your opponent directly. While this card is co-linked, it can attack twice during each Battle Phase. If a "Trapod" monster you control inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can Set 1 of your banished "Trapod" Traps to your field. You can only use this effect of "Marching Trapod" once per turn.
2018762.name: Marching Trapod

2018774.effect:
1 non-Link "Trapod" monster
You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you Special Summon this card, except "Trapod" monsters. While this card is co-linked, it cannot be targeted for attacks, also it gains 800 ATK. During the Main Phase: You can Set 1 "Trapod" Spell/Trap directly from your Deck to your field. This is a Quick Effect while it is co-linked. You can only use this effect of "Transmitting Trapod" once per turn.
2018774.name: Transmitting Trapod

2018780.effect:
2 "Trapod" monsters with different names
You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you Summon this card, except DARK Machine monsters.
You can activate "Trapod" Traps the turn they are Set.
During your Main Phase: You can target 1 "Trapod" Trap in your GY; Set it to your field. You can only use this effect of "Activating Trapod" once per turn.
2018780.name: Activating Trapod

2019198.effect: If you control a "Lady of Lament" monster other than "Keymaster, Lady of Lament", or a "the Wicked" monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card on the field is Tributed to activate a card or effect: You can add 1 "Lady of Lament" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Keymaster, Lady of Lament" once per turn.
2019198.name: Keymaster, Lady of Lament

2019215.effect: If a DARK monster is Tributed: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card on the field is Tributed to activate a card or effect: You can target 1 Level 4 or lower Fiend monster in your GY: Special Summon it. You can only use each effect of "Shadus, the Wicked Reaper" once per turn.
2019215.name: Shadus, the Wicked Reaper

2019237.effect: Add 1 "Diabolos", "the Wicked" or a "Lady of Lament" monster from your Deck to your hand, then you can Tribute 1 monster you control, and if you do: Special Summon the added monster. You can only activate 1 "Tormenting Tricks" per turn. If a "Torment Token" is on the field, you can activate this card from your hand.
2019237.name: Tormenting Tricks

2019224.effect:
4 Level 8 monsters
Once per turn, you can also Xyz Summon this card, by Tributing 1 monster you control and by using a "Diabolos" monster you control as material (This is treated as an Xyz Summon.) If summoned this way: You can attach up to 2 cards from your GY to this card as material. Cannot be Tributed. Cannot be destroyed by card effects while it has a "Diabolos" monster as material. (Quick Effect) You can detach 1 material from this card, Tribute 1 monster you control, then target 1 face-up card on the field; negate its effects, until the end of the turn. During the End Phase, you can Tribute 2 "Torment Tokens" on any side of the field: Special Summon 1 Leve 4 or lower Fiend monster from your hand or GY. You can only use each effect of "Galactic Diabolos, Harbinger of the Void" once per turn.
2019224.name: Galactic Diabolos, Harbinger of the Void
2019224.treated_as: Galactic Diabolos, Harbinger of the Void

1757497.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned, you can discard 1 "Ananta" card; add 1 "Ananta's Temptation" from your Deck to your hand. If this card is banished by the effect of an "Ananta" card: You can Special Summon this card, and if you do, it's original ATK and DEF become 1500. You cannot Summon monsters the turn you activate either of this card's effects, except "Ananta" monsters. You can only use each effect of "Ananta's Servant, Medusa" once per turn.
1757497.name: Ananta's Servant, Medusa

1757506.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned, you can discard 1 "Ananta" card; add 1 "Ananta's Mirror" from your Deck to your hand. If this card is banished by the effect of an "Ananta" card: You can Special Summon this card, and if you do, it's orgianl ATK and DEF become 1500. You cannot Summon monsters the turn you activate either of this card's effects, except "Ananta" monsters. You can only use each effect of "Ananta's Servant, Euryale" once per turn.
1757506.name: Ananta's Servant, Euryale

1757515.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned, you can discard 1 "Ananta" card; add 1 "Ananta's Manifestation" from your Deck to your hand. If this card is banished by the effect of an "Ananta" card: You can Special Summon this card, and if you do, it's orgianl ATK and DEF become 1500. You cannot Summon monsters the turn you activate either of this card's effects, except "Ananta" monsters. You can only use each effect of "Ananta's Servant, Stheno" once per turn.
1757515.name: Ananta's Servant, Stheno

1757540.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned, you can target 1 "Ananta" monster in your GY; Special Summon it. If this card is banished by the effect of an "Ananta" card: You can Special Summon this card, and if you do, it's original ATK and DEF become 1500. You cannot Summon monsters the turn you activate either of this card's effects, except "Ananta" monsters. You can only use each effect of "Manifestation of Ananta, Apophis" once per turn.
1757540.name: Manifestation of Ananta, Apophis

1757544.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned, you can reveal 1 "Ananta" monster from your hand; Special Summon it, and if you do, you can gain 500 LP. If this card is banished by the effect of an "Ananta" card: You can Special Summon this card, and if you do, it's original ATK and DEF become 1500. You cannot Summon monsters the turn you activate either of this card's effects, except "Ananta" monsters. You can only use each effect of "Manifestation of Ananta, Apep" once per turn.
1757544.name: Manifestation of Ananta, Apep

1757553.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned, you can discard 1 "Ananta" card: Special Summon Level 4 or lower "Ananta" monster from your Deck. If this card is banished by the effect of an "Ananta" card: You can Special Summon this card, and if you do, it's original ATK and DEF become 1500. You cannot Summon monsters the turn you activate either of this card's effects, except "Ananta" monsters. You can only use each effect of "Manifestation of Ananta, Vritra" once per turn.
1757553.name: Manifestation of Ananta, Vritra

1757567.effect:
If you control an "Ananta" monster, you can activate this card from your hand. Banish 1 "Ananta" card from your hand, then apply 1 of the following effects:
● Add up to 2 "Ananta" monsters from your Deck to your hand, then discard 1 card.
● Special Summon 1 "Ananta" monster from your hand or GY.
If this card is in your GY, and you control "Evil Dragon Ananta", you can banish this card from your GY; send 1 "Ananta" monster from your Deck to your GY. You can only activate 1 "Ananta's Manifestation" per turn.
1757567.name: Ananta's Manifestation

1757573.effect: If you control an "Ananta" monster, you can activate this card from your hand. Banish 1 "Ananta" card from your hand: Fusion Summon 1 "Ananta" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by banishing Fusion Materials listed on it from your hand, field, or GY. If you would use "Evil Dragon Ananta" as Fusion Material, you can send that monster to the GY, instead of banishing it. If this card is in your GY, and you control an "Ananta" monster, you can banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Evil Dragon" Ananta" from your Deck to your hand, also Special Summon 2 "Sacrifice to Ananta" Tokens (Reptile/DARK/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0). You can only activate this effect of "Ananta's Mirror" once per turn.
1757573.name: Ananta's Mirror

1757579.effect: If you control an "Ananta" monster, you can activate this card from your hand. Banish 1 "Ananta" card from your hand; negate the effects of 1 card your opponent controls. If you control "Evil Dragon Ananta" at this card's activation, you can negate the effects of all cards in this card's column this turn, except "Ananta" cards. If this card is in your GY, and you control an "Ananta" monster, you can banish this card from your GY: Shuffle all "Ananta" cards that are banished or in your GY into the Deck, and if you shuffled 5 or more cards by this effect, you can draw 1 card. You can only activate 1 "Ananta's Temptation" per turn.
1757579.name: Ananta's Temptation

1472.effect: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by removing from play all Reptile-Type monsters from your side of the field and Graveyard. This card's ATK and DEF are each equal to the number of monsters you removed x 600. During each of your End Phases, destroy 1 card on the field.
1472.name: Evil Dragon Ananta

1757556.effect: "Ananta's Servant, Medusa" + 1 "Ananta" monsterUnaffected by monster efffects. If this card is Fusion Summoned, you can target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy it. You can discard 1 "Ananta" card, then target 1 "Ananta" card in your GY; add it to your hand. If this card is banished by the effect of an "Ananta" card: You can Special Summon this card, and if you do, it's original ATK and DEF become 2500. You cannot Summon monsters the turn you activate either of this card's effects, except "Ananta" monsters. You can only use each effect of "Ananta's Disciple, Medusa" once per turn.
1757556.name: Ananta's Disciple, Medusa

1757559.effect: "Ananta's Servant, Euryale" + 1 "Ananta" monsterUnaffected by Spell efffects. If this card is Fusion Summoned, you can target 1 face-up Spell your opponent controls; destroy it. You can discard 1 "Ananta" card, then target 1 card on the field; negate it's effects. If this card is banished by the effect of an "Ananta" card: You can Special Summon this card, and if you do, it's original ATK and DEF become 2500. You cannot Summon monsters the turn you activate either of this card's effects, except "Ananta" monsters. You can only use each effect of "Ananta's Disciple, Euryale" once per turn.
1757559.name: Ananta's Disciple, Euryale

1757563.effect: "Ananta's Servant, Stheno" + 1 "Ananta" monsterUnaffected by Trap efffects. If this card is Fusion Summoned, you can target 1 face-up Trap your opponent controls; destroy it. You can discard 1 "Ananta" card, then target 1 banished "Ananta" Trap; add it to your hand. If this card is banished by the effect of an "Ananta" card: You can Special Summon this card, and if you do, it's original ATK and DEF become 2500. You cannot Summon monsters the turn you activate either of this card's effects, except "Ananta" monsters. You can only use each effect of "Ananta's Disciple, Stheno" once per turn.
1757563.name: Ananta's Disciple, Stheno

2009947.effect: If you control no monsters, or all monsters you control are "Spellmaker" monsters: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. When this card is Summoned: You can target 1 Spell/Trap in your GY; Special Summon it as a Normal Monster (Zombie/DARK/Level 4/ATK 0/DEF 0). You can only use each effect of "Nemain, Spellmaker of the Death" once per turn.
2009947.name: Nemain, Spellmaker of the Death

2010008.effect: If you control no monsters, or if you control a "Spellmaker" monster with less ATK that this card: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. When this card is Summoned: You can target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; Special Summon it to your field as a Normal Monster (Warrior/DARK/Level 4/ATK 0/DEF 0). You can only use each effect of "Fodla, Spellmaker of the Middle Ages" once per turn.
2010008.name: Fodla, Spellmaker of the Middle Ages

21652.effect: If this card is Special Summoned from the GY by the effect of a Link Monster: You can Special Summon 1 Level 1 "Antrap" monster from your GY. You cannot Special Summon other monsters, except "Antrap" monsters during the turn you activate this effect.
21652.name: Antrap Tarsus

21676.effect: If you control no monsters, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can Tribute this card; send 1 "Antrap" monster from your Deck to your GY, and if you do, you can Special Summon 1 "Antrap" monster from your GY. You can only Special Summon 1 "Antrap Thorax" per turn.
21676.name: Antrap Thorax

21697.effect: If an "Antrap" monster is Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Antrap" Spell/Trap card from your Deck or your GY to your hand. If an "Antrap" monster you control is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can target 1 "Antrap" monster in your GY; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "The Antrap's Nest" once per turn.
21697.name: The Antrap's Nest

251958.effect: Equip only to an "Antrap" monster. If the equipped monster battles an opponent's monster, before damage calculation: You can banish that monster, then destroy this card. If you control an "Antrap" monster: You can banish this card from the GY, then target up to 2 Spells/Traps the opponent controls; destroy those targets. You can only use 1 effect of "Confusion of the Antrap's Nest" per turn, and only once that turn.
251958.name: Confusion of the Antrap's Nest

21714.effect: Add 1 "Antrap" monster from your Deck to your hand. During your Main Phase: You can banish this card from your GY; send 1 "Antrap" monster from your Deck to your GY. You can only use 1 effect of "Construction of the Antrap's Nest" per turn, and only once that turn.
21714.name: Construction of the Antrap's Nest

79359.effect: You can target 1 "Antrap" monster you control; that monster is unaffected by card effects until the end of this turn. You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Antrap" monster from your Deck. You can only use 1 effect of "Coronation of the Antrap's Nest" per turn, and only once that turn.
79359.name: Coronation of the Antrap's Nest

21724.effect: When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap card or effect while you control at least 2 "Antrap" Link monsters: Negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it. When your opponent activates an effect while this card is in your GY and you control an "Antrap" Link monster (except during the Damage Step): You can banish this card from your GY; destroy 1 card on the field. You can only use 1 effect of "Collapse of the Antrap's Nest" per turn, and only once that turn.
21724.name: Collapse of the Antrap's Nest

79412.effect: Target 1 monster in a zone your "Antrap" monster points to; banish that monster. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 monster the opponent controls; move that monster to a Main Monster Zone that an "Antrap" monster points to. You can only use 1 effect of "Colossus of the Antrap's Nest" per turn, and only once that turn.
79412.name: Colossus of the Antrap's Nest

676372.effect:
7 "Antrap" monsters, including 3 Link monsters
This card's Special Summon cannot be negated, also your opponent cannot activate cards or their effects in response to this card's Summon or effect activation. When this card is Link Summoned: Shuffle all cards on the opponent's side of the field, in their GY, hand, face-up Extra Deck, or that is banished into the Deck, also, for the rest of this turn, you cannot Summon monsters or declare an attack. 
(This card cannot be used in a Custom Card Tournament.)
676372.name: Antrap Behemoth

1551612.effect: A terrifying monster that hides in the sand. It's rumored that it's actually made of multiple sentient organisms, which each have highly specialized roles. They create the illusion of a huge monster in order to protect their nest, which they worked hard to build.
1551612.name: The Antrap

21570.effect: 2+ "Antrap" monstersWhile co-linked with an "Antrap" Link Monster, monsters in your opponent's Center Main Monster Zone have their effects negated. If this card is Link Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 1 "Antrap" monster from your GY to your Main Monster Zone this card points to. You can only Special Summon "Antrap" monsters the turn you activate this effect. You can only use this effect of "Antrap Mandible L" once per turn.
21570.name: Antrap Mandible L

21579.effect: 2+ "Antrap" monstersWhile co-linked with an "Antrap" Link Monster, monsters in your opponent's Center Main Monster Zone are changed to Attack Position, also their ATK becomes 0. If this card is Link Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 1 "Antrap" monster from your GY to your Main Monster Zone this card points to. You can only Special Summon "Antrap" monsters the turn you activate this effect. You can only use this effect of "Antrap Mandible R" once per turn.
21579.name: Antrap Mandible R

21585.effect: 2 "Antrap" monstersIf this card is Link Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 1 "Antrap" monster from your GY. You can only use this effect of "Antrap Maxilla" once per turn. You cannot Summon monsters, other than "Antrap" monsters. Once per turn, if this card is co-linked with an "Antrap" monster (Quick Effect): You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; move it to another Main Monster Zone on their field.
21585.name: Antrap Maxilla
